title: Understanding Heart Disease
content: Heart disease is a range of conditions that affect your heart. It is important to know the symptoms and causes.
author: Dr. Jane Smith

title: Managing Diabetes Effectively
content: Diabetes can be managed effectively with proper care, diet, and medication. Learn the key strategies for control.
author: Dr. Michael Johnson

title: Preventing Stroke: Tips and Guidelines
content: Stroke is preventable in many cases. Follow these guidelines to reduce the risk of stroke and stay healthy.
author: Dr. Susan Williams
